column4: what are the effects of installing a server edition on desktop ?
then il go with the v9 desktop edition disk that i have
if i start now itl take 1 or 2 days for me to finish download
whats the mion space for v12 to get installed ?
sda7 and sda8 says linux and linux swap/solaris
so thats the partition i need to delete and install v12 ?
don't go for older version, u will end up with repeating the same tasks again
u can even download from torrent.....
sda7 and sda8 says linux and linux swap/solaris
no need to delete any partition
so i can download v12, burn and select install option it will automatically use sda7 and sda8 ?
no modification is required, important to take backup of your data......
how to back up my data ? its not even booting in
that's difficult. ..... should ask an expert then ....

try to solve you current problem as much as possible, fresh installation will not harm you data (most of the time, as claimed) but you never know. i screwed up, but i was able to take a backup before that..... :D all the best ..
you can even take help of a friend who has linux, make your harddisk accessible by his system and take a backup, in case your data exceeds the usb drive capacity ...
